snippet: A huge pension fund is considering a strategy to protect retirees from market gyrations when a big loss of principal would be devastating.
abstract: California State Teachers' Retirement System is considering whether to move as much as $20 billion of its portfolio out of stocks and fixed-income investments.
lead_paragraph: A huge pension fund is considering a strategy to protect retirees from market gyrations when a big loss of principal would be devastating.

headline.main: Calstrs Aims to Cut Risk by Moving Up to $20 Billion Out of Stocks
headline.print_headline: Calstrs Eyes a Strategy to Cut Risk
